alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Trumbull, southeastern Ashtabula and southwestern Crawford Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Kinsman, or 21 miles north of Warren, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinsman, Andover, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Pymatuning Central, Adamsville, Atlantic, Cherry Valley, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Conneaut Lakeshore and Hartstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio...and northwestern Pennsylvania.
